name: event
doc: Wrapper for an Event object. https://api.slack.com/types/event

fields.name: token
fields.doc: A verification token to validate that the event originated from Slack (deprecated).

fields.name: team_id
fields.doc: The unique identifier of the workspace where the event occurred.

fields.name: api_app_id
fields.doc: The unique identifier of your installed Slack application. Use this to distinguish which app the event belongs to if you use multiple apps with the same Request URL.

fields.name: type
fields.doc: The specific name of the event

fields.name: type
fields.doc: Indicates which kind of event dispatch this is, usually `event_callback`

fields.name: event_id
fields.doc: A unique identifier for this specific event, globally unique across all workspaces.

fields.name: event_time
fields.doc: The epoch timestamp in seconds indicating when this event was dispatched.

fields.name: authed_users
fields.doc: An array of string-based User IDs. Each member of the collection represents a user that has installed your application/bot and indicates the described event would be visible to those users.

fields.name: authed_users
fields.doc: An array of string-based Team IDs. Each member of the collection represents a team that has installed the application/bot and indicates the described event would be visible to those teams.
